archimate:Capability.name: Stakeholder Management
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to develop and manage effective working relationships with key stakeholders throughout the enterprise. Strong stakeholder relationships are a key capability for establishing the architecture practice as a consultative and advisory practice.This capability is essential in all aspects of architecture whether it is solution architecture, supporting production issue resolution, developing roadmaps or defining target architectures to support new business models.
Outcomes:
Clear identification of key stakeholders within the organisation Strong relationships with key stakeholders Early engagement in initiatives
